content: this is the name for the v-necked pullover version of this pattern the book includes other variations including jewel crew neck no sweat sweatshirt-like runaround short sleeved and rah-rah-boon-dee-ay v-neck with fancy fringed sleeves and bottom i hook for main body of sweater h hook for optional ribbed neck and cuff bands this pattern was published in canadian living as an excerpt from the book but is only available online 1 via the wayback machine finished bust 33 36 39 41 45 48 51 54 / 84 91 99 106 5 114 122 129 5 137 cm 1 http //web archive org/web/20090207031413/http //www canadianliving com/crafts/crochet/crocheted_v_neck_pullover php
